prontera,140,174,5	script	Cards Shop	745,{
mes "[Cards Shop]";
mes "I am selling diffent kind of cards to CASH POINTS.";
next;
menu 
"Check all cards from A ~ G",AG,
"Check all cards from H ~ Q",HQ,
"Check all cards from R ~ Z",RZ;


AG:
		close2;
		callshop "AG",1;
		end;
HQ:
		close2;
		callshop "HQ",1;
		end;
RZ:
		close2;
		callshop "RZ",1;
		end;

}

prontera,1,1,1	cashshop	AG	111,4140:6000,4409:2000,4244:2000,4253:2000,4402:2000,4252:2000,4245:2000,4062:1000,4248:2000,4249:2000,4043:1000,4234:2000,4138:2000,4242:2000,4094:1000,4371:2000,4114:2000,4075:2000,4246:2000,4233:2000,4438:2000,4129:2000,4119:2000,4356:2000,4074:2000,4327:2000,4214:2000,4379:2000,4212:2000,4428:2000,4390:1000,4063:1000,4288:2000,4368:2000,4202:1000,4235:2000,4299:2000,4229:2000,4041:2000,4293:2000,4297:2000,4392:2000,4169:2000,4388:1000,4082:1000,4125:1000,4122:2000,4370:2000,4181:2000,4098:2000,4178:2000,4069:1000,4004:1000,4421:1000,4177:2000,4176:1000,4056:2000,4118:1000,4410:2000,4346:2000,4251:2000,4217:2000,4360:1000,4349:2000,4262:2000,4141:2000,4267:2000,4160:2000,4439:2000,4080:1000,4319:2000,4088:2000,4405:2000,4312:1000,4151:2000,4423:2000,4323:1000,4149:2000,4354:2000,4280:2000,4110:2000,4303:2000,4087:2000,4157:1000,4060:1000,4156:1000,4378:2000,4161:2000,4381:2000,4164:2000
